TopicTitle: JC2 MP Beta to be released soon???

Articles.Content: Huh, I thought that was dead for good.

Lol it turns out that it was never truly dead. Its just that the only way to get this to MP is to like reverse engineer sh1t that nobody had.figured out so they kept it secret so they could release it with out anyone stealing their code and stuff.... something like that.

Also nova idk if you ever saw the thread I posted about me finding you on the. JC2 forums so I was called a stalker lol its kinda funny actually

Anyways we should all play together when it comes out

Ugh. If I had a powerful PC, I guarantee I\'d have got JC2 on PC. As it is, my PC can\'t handle the most basic games above 15fps, so I got JC2 for Xbox.

Well, I guess Just Cause 3 will probably have multiplayer in it to begin with. I would love to see more footage from this mod, though.
